name: Marlin
description: A fast and powerful fish with a long bill and a large dorsal fin. Known for its speed and acrobatic leaps when hooked.

name: Swordfish
description: Characterized by its long, flat bill resembling a sword. Found in oceanic regions and known for its powerful swimming abilities.

name: Mahi-mahi
description: Also known as dolphinfish, mahi-mahi is a colorful and highly prized fish in sport fishing. It is known for its speed and agility.

name: Wahoo
description: A sleek and fast predatory fish found in tropical and subtropical waters. Known for its speed and powerful strikes.

name: Yellowfin Tuna
description: A large species of tuna found in tropical and subtropical waters. Known for its speed, strength, and high-quality meat.

name: Bluefin Tuna
description: One of the largest tuna species, prized for its rich flavor and high market value. Highly migratory and can reach impressive sizes.

name: Giant Trevally
description: A powerful predatory fish found in the tropical waters of the Indian and Pacific Oceans. Known for its strength and aggressive behavior.

name: Atlantic Sailfish
description: A species of billfish known for its distinctive sail-like dorsal fin and impressive speed. Found in the Atlantic Ocean.

name: Black Marlin
description: One of the largest marlin species, known for its incredible strength and powerful leaps when hooked. Found in tropical and subtropical waters.

name: Atlantic Blue Marlin
description: A highly sought-after game fish known for its size, speed, and strength. Found in the Atlantic Ocean.

name: Yellowtail Amberjack
description: A strong and fast-swimming fish found in temperate and tropical waters. Known for its delicious flesh and powerful fighting ability.

name: Atlantic Tarpon
description: A large, silver-colored fish known for its acrobatic leaps when hooked. Found in coastal waters of the Atlantic Ocean and the Gulf of Mexico.

name: Yellowfin Grouper
description: A large species of grouper found in the warm waters of the Atlantic Ocean and the Gulf of Mexico. Known for its impressive size and delicious taste.

name: Dogtooth Tuna
description: A powerful predatory fish found in tropical and subtropical waters. Known for its large size, sharp teeth, and powerful swimming ability.

name: Yellowfin Croaker
description: A species of croaker found along the Pacific coast of North and South America. Known for its yellow fins and distinctive croaking sound.

name: Goliath Grouper
description: One of the largest species of grouper, found in the warm waters of the Atlantic Ocean and the Gulf of Mexico. Known for its immense size and strength.

name: Atlantic Cod
description: A well-known species of fish found in the cold waters of the North Atlantic. Prized for its white flesh and versatility in cooking.

name: Barracuda
description: A predatory fish known for its long, slender body and sharp teeth. Found in tropical and subtropical oceans, often near coral reefs.

name: Great Barracuda
description: The largest species of barracuda, known for its aggressive behavior and impressive size. Found in warm coastal waters worldwide.

name: Yellowtail Kingfish
description: A powerful and fast-swimming fish found in temperate and tropical waters. Highly prized for its firm flesh and rich flavor.

name: Amberjack
description: A group of strong, fast-swimming fish found in temperate and tropical waters. Prized for their fighting ability and delicious flesh.

name: Kingfish
description: A powerful and fast-swimming fish found in temperate and tropical waters. Highly prized for its firm flesh and rich flavor.

name: Barramundi
description: A predatory fish found in the Indo-Pacific region. Known for its ability to thrive in both saltwater and freshwater habitats.

name: Cobia
description: A large, fast-swimming fish found in warm ocean waters. Known for its firm texture and mild flavor, often used in sushi.

name: Striped Bass
description: A popular game fish found in North America, prized for its fighting ability and delicious flesh. Known for its distinctive stripes along the length of its body.

name: Roosterfish
description: A prized game fish found in the Pacific Ocean, known for its distinctive appearance and powerful fighting ability. Named for the rooster-like comb on its head.

name: Red Snapper
description: A popular food fish found in the Gulf of Mexico and the southeastern United States. Prized for its sweet, nutty flavor and firm texture.

name: Yellowfin Grouper
description: A large species of grouper found in the warm waters of the Atlantic Ocean and the Gulf of Mexico. Known for its impressive size and delicious taste.

name: Dolphinfish
description: Also known as mahi-mahi or dorado, dolphinfish is a colorful and highly prized fish in sport fishing. Known for its speed and acrobatic leaps.

name: Atlantic Halibut
description: A large flatfish found in the cold waters of the North Atlantic. Prized for its mild, sweet flavor and firm texture, often served grilled or pan-fried.
